pages.text: Loose items on the ground will be gathered by magic and drawn into an adjacent inventory.$(br2)This operation is performed at regular intervals for the duration of the ritual, making it ideal for gathering up things regularly dropped.$(br2)$(warning) The target inventory can be located in anywhere around the pyre - except beneath.
As a $(l:rituals/tiers)$(bold)tier 0$() ritual, there are no additional requirements to complete this ritual.
The target inventory can be placed at any of the torch locations.

pages.title: Ritual Specifics
pages.text: $(bold)Duration:$() The ritual lasts for $(ritual:gathering/SECONDS/duration) seconds.$(br2)$(bold)Size:$() Ritual area extends $(ritual:gathering/radius_x) and $(ritual:gathering/radius_z) blocks from the center, and vertically by $(ritual:gathering/radius_y) blocks.$(br2)$(bold)Frequency:$() Items are checked for every $(ritual:gathering/SECONDS/interval) seconds.
